member.name: T:System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding
member.summary: Represents a UDP binding.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified configuration name.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding.CreateBindingElements
member.summary: Creates a collection of binding elements.
member.returns: A collection of binding elements.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding.DuplicateMessageHistoryLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the duplicate message history length in a UDP binding element.
member.returns: The maximum number of message hashes used by the binding to identify duplicate messages.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding.MaxBufferPoolSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a maximum buffer pool size associated with the binding.
member.returns: A number that indicates the size of a buffer pool.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding.MaxPendingMessagesTotalSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of messages that are received but not yet removed from the input queue for an individual channel instance.
member.returns: The maximum number of pending messages.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding.MaxReceivedMessageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size for a message that can be processed by the binding.
member.returns: The maximum size for a message that can be processed by the binding.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding.MaxRetransmitCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of retransmit messages in a UDP binding.
member.returns: The maximum number of retransmit messages in a UDP binding.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding.MulticastInterfaceId
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the MulticastInterfaceID property in a UDP binding.
member.returns: The network adapter that is used when sending and receiving multicast traffic on multi-honed machines.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding.ReaderQuotas
member.summary: Gets or sets the reader quotas.
member.returns: The reader quotas.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding.Scheme
member.summary: Gets the scheme name for this binding.
member.returns: The scheme name for this binding.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding.ShouldSerializeReaderQuotas
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the ReaderQuotas should be serialized.
member.returns: True if the ReaderQuotas should be serialized; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding.ShouldSerializeTextEncoding
member.summary: Returns whether settings for text encoding should be serialized.
member.returns: True if the settings for text encoding should be serialized; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding.System#ServiceModel#Channels#IBindingRuntimePreferences#ReceiveSynchronously
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether incoming requests are handled synchronously or asynchronously.
member.returns: True if incoming requests are handled synchronously; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding.TextEncoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the text encoding that is used for the binding.
member.returns: The text encoding.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding.TimeToLive
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the TimeToLive property in a UDP binding.
member.returns: The number of network segment hops that a multicast packet can traverse.

member.summary: The binding element that specifies the message encoding as a stream of bytes and has the option to specify the character encoding.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified quota.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement.BuildChannelFactory``1(System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext)
member.summary: Builds the channel factory stack on the client that creates a specified type of channel for a specified context.
member.returns: A channel factory of type for the specified context.
member.param: The binding context for the channel.
member.typeparam: The type of channel the channel factory produces.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement.BuildChannelListener``1(System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext)
member.summary: Builds the channel listener on the service that accepts a specified type of channel for a specified context.
member.returns: A channel listener of type for the specified context.
member.param: The binding context for the listener.
member.typeparam: The type of channel the channel listener accepts.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement.CanBuildChannelFactory``1(System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext)
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the current binding can build a factory for a specified type of channel and context.
member.returns: true if the specified channel factory stack can be built on the service; otherwise, false.
member.param: The binding context for the channel.
member.typeparam: The type of channel the channel factory produces.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement.CanBuildChannelListener``1(System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext)
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the current binding can build a listener for a specified type of channel and context.
member.returns: true if the specified channel listener stack can be built on the service; otherwise, false.
member.param: The binding context for the listener.
member.typeparam: The type of channel the channel listener accepts.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement.Clone
member.summary: Creates a new object initialized from the current one.
member.returns: A binding element with property values equal to those of the current element.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement.CreateMessageEncoderFactory
member.summary: Creates a factory for byte stream message encoders that employ the SOAP and WS-Addressing versions and the character encoding specified by the current encoding binding element.
member.returns: The message encoder factory that this binding element creates.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement.MessageVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the SOAP message and WS-Addressing versions that are used or expected.
member.returns: The message version that is used or expected.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement.ReaderQuotas
member.summary: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of XML messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding element.
member.returns: The complexity constraints on SOAP messages exchanged. The default values for these constraints are provided in the following remarks section.

member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
member.returns: false.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessageEncodingBindingElement.ShouldSerializeReaderQuotas
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
member.returns: true if the property value should be serialized; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty.TryGet(System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message,System.ServiceModel.Channels.NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty@)
member.summary: Attempts to get the NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty from the properties of a specified message.
member.returns: True when a value for the NetworkInterfaceMessageproperty is obtained from the message; otherwise, false.

member.returns: True when a value for the NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty is obtained from the properties; otherwise, false.

The method returns true, networkInterfaceMessageProperty contains a NetworkInterfaceMessageProperty that is associated with the properties.
